data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_bag_tools: filter_bag: Copy: Safer implementation preventing infinite loops.

data.author: Martin Pecka

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_bag_tools: filter_bag: ExportCameraInfoToYAML: Do not write empty files.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_bag_tools: filter_bag: Fix the case when trying to set param when no params are available.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_bag_tools: extract_images: Fixed autodetection of PNG format.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_bag_tools: extract_images: Better default image formats in case none is specified.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_bag_tools: extract_images, extract_pcd: Init ROS time to allow throttled loggers.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_bag_tools: filter_bag: Added CLI args for FixHeader.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_bag_tools: extract_images: Do not export depth in RVL by default.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_bag_tools: filter_bag: fixed merge initial static TF

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_bag_tools: filter_bag: fixed fixing receive stamp

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_bag_tools: filter_bag: Smoother queue processing, prevents huge memory usage spikes.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_bag_tools: filter_bag: Added min_velocity to ExtractJointStatesVelocityAsCommands

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_bag_tools: extract_images: Correctly name the first output file if config.out_format is not specified.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: image_transport_codecs: Support non-standard compression formats from cv_image_transport.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_bag_tools: extract_images: Added support for compressing images into a ZIP archive.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_bag_tools: extract_pcd: Added ZIP compression options.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_bag_tools: extract_pcd: Added option to zip the PCD files.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_bag_tools: separated PCD convertor to its own Python module.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_bag_tools: filter_bag: More verbose password removal filter.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_bag_tools: filter_bag: Added proximity mode to BlurDetections.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_bag_tools: filter_bag: Added ImageTransportFilter that serves as a base for all filters that read images.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_bag_tools: filter_bag: Added a few handy functions.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_bag_tools: filter_bag: Added more bag tags.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_bag_tools: filter_bag: Added change_stamps option to MergeInitialStaticTf.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_bag_tools: filter_bag: Improved detection of damaged basler camera images.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_bag_tools: filter_bag: Filtered messages are now being assigned tags based on the bag file they come from.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_bag_tools: filter_bag: Added DetectDamagedBaslerImages and DropMessagesFromCSV.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_bag_tools: filter_bag: FixCameraCalibration: Resolve calibration file path.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_bag_tools: filter_bag: Make MessageFilter.resolve_file() more capable.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_bag_tools: filter_bag: RecomputeAckermannOdometry: Added configurable twist covariance.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_bag_tools: filter_bag: FixHeader: Fixed a bug.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_bag_tools: filter_bag: FixJointStates: Fix deriving velocity from positions.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_bag_tools: filter_bag: FixHeader: Support changing receive stamp.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_bag_tools: filter_bag: RecomputeTFFromJointStates: Allow discarding failed TFs.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_bag_tools: filter_bag: Added ability to compute a virtual cmd_vel from AckermannOdometry.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_bag_tools: filter_bag: Added extra_bags option to pass additional bag files.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_bag_tools: filter_bag: Expanded options for output bag file pattern.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_bag_tools: message_filters: FixJointStates got the ability to normalize angles and integrate positions from velocities.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_bag_tools: message_filters: RecomputeTFFromJointStates can now also create TFs not previously present in the bag.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_bag_tools: message_filters: Improved Deduplicate filter, addded DeduplicateJointStates, DeduplicateTF.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message:
cras_bag_tools: Added support for tagging messages in message_filter .

The tags can be used for various tasks such as differentiating between original and generated messages or preventing a filter from working on messages it has created.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_py_common: string_utils: Fixed bug stringifying negative durations.

data.author: Tobias Fischer

data.message:
image_transport_codecs: Fixed RVL decoder incorrectly marking some images as malformed.

Apparently, the compression ratio can get better that 5:1 (happens mostly in images with large NaN areas).

Improved compatibility with newer compilers.

Resolves https://github.com/RoboStack/ros-noetic/pull/501#issuecomment-2567224502 .

Works around https://github.com/ros/ros_comm/issues/2324 .

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message:
Removed catkin_lint buildfarm hacks.

They can be dropped because catkin_lint 1.6.22 has been released.

The catkin_lint package checks won't work on buildfarm, but at least they won't stop the build. Correctness of build_depends is enforced via different mechanisms on the buildfarm.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message:
cras_cpp_common: Fixed FindFilesystem CMake module usage of try_compile

The previous version deleted the temporary source file after each try_compile code, so
when the first try_compile did not succeed, the other try_compile() calls no longer had
the file to compile.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_cpp_common: node_from_nodelet: Fix syntax for Melodic.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_topic_tools: Made use of the simplified syntax of node_from_nodelet.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message:
cras_cpp_common: node_from_nodelet: Implemented a simplified version that doesn't need the nodelet header file.

Also fixed a bug with missing return 0 at the end of main.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_cpp_common: time_utils: Bring back Melodic compatibility

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_cpp_common: param_utils: Added getParam() specialization for geometry_msgs/Pose messages.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_cpp_common: nodelet_utils: Added Resettable interface to NodeletWithSharedTfBuffer.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_cpp_common: Added Resettable interface compatible with cras_py_common.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message:
cras_cpp_common: Do not use -march=native optimizations for cras_tf2_sensor_msgs.

Native arch is not available when cross-compiling. Also, using native is dangerous on buildfarm as the built binary depends on which runner built the job.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: Switch Github Actions to ros-shadow-fixed repos.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message:
cras_topic_tools: Simplified lazy subscriber classes and nodelet code. Added ~tcp_no_delay param to most nodelets. API breaks included, but hopefully nothing will be affected.

API breaks:

- LazySubscriberBase->ConditionalSubscriber
- LazySubscriber: callback is now passed as parameter instead of being a virtual member function
- GenericLazyPubSub: callback is now passed as parameter instead of being a virtual member function
- the nodelets no longer have a dedicated PubSub object that would be reusable elsewhere (the minimum probability of reuse does not outweigh the code complications it brings)

data.author: Martin Pecka

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message:
cras_cpp_common: Completely reworked log_utils to use macros instead of functions.

This was needed because of the static log_location variables inside ROS_ macros - e.g. _ONCE was only triggered once regardless of where was it called from. There were also not so helpful file:line data in the logged messages.

Backwards compatibility was kept 99%, but there are subtle cases where it will fail - e.g. if there was `this->log->logError()` right after an `if` or `else` without braces.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_docs_common: Install the Spinx theme files.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_py_common: ctypes_utils: Do not add one byte to StringAlloc allocated size. The caller has to do it now.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_docs_common: Temporarily disable python3-catkin-sphinx until the rosdep key exists.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_topic_tools: Added cras::ShapeShifter as a memory-safe option for Melodic.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: Added cras_docs_common with a common Sphinx configuration.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_py_common: ctypes_utils: Autodetection of length of a BufferStringIO stream.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message:
cras_cpp_common: Fixed doxygen configuration and a few documentation errors.

To get a clean rosdoc_lite run, set

INPUT_FILTER = "sed 's/\([ <]\)::/\1/g'"

 in doxy.template in rosdoc_lite .

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_cpp_common: xmlrpc_value_utils: Added conversion to dynamic_reconfigure/Config message.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_py_common: Added utilities for working with ctypes.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_topic_tools: Added a method to convert a message instance to ShapeShifter.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_bag_tools: Move merge_bag higher in readme.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: CI: update github actions to newest versions

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: Enable cras_bag_tools in Github Actions CI.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_py_common: Allow resetting nodes by topic.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_py_common: Added support for enums in to_str() and param utils.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_py_common: Hide tf2_ros includes in geometry_utils.py inside function calls.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_py_common: Relay attribute access in GenericMessageSubscriber to the raw subscriber (to allow e.g. calling unsubscribe()).

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_py_common: Pass connection header to user callback in GenericMessageSubscriber.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_py_common: Moved get_msg_type from type_utils to message_utils and added get_msg_field there.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: camera_throttle: Correctly propagate ~image_transport parameter to image subscribers.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_cpp_common: Added support for std::array parameters.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_py_common: Fixed StaticTransformBroadcaster on Noetic and added unit test for it.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message:
Merge branch 'upgrade' into 'master'

Many improvements

See merge request cras/subt/common/ros-utils!1

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: tf_static_publisher: Fix CMake warning on Noetic.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_topic_tools: Lower test_repeat thresholds even more, OSRF buildfarm is really bad at this

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_py_common: Remove support for long integer type to achieve compatibility with Python 3.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_py_common: Extended functionality to get closer to cras_cpp_common.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: Improved readmes and added more badges to them.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_topic_tools: Added option to change_header to apply current ROS time to stamp.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: De-flake throttle test and enable catkin_lint when it has chance to run correctly.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: Make sure catkin_lint knows the current ROS distro (ROS Buildfarm was a bit secretive).

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: Build cras_py_common and cras_topic_tools on Github actions.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_cpp_common: Set up roslaunch-check for test files.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_cpp_common: catkin_lint, moved external folder inside include/project to avoid collisions with other projects.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_topic_tools: De-flake and speed up throttle test.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_topic_tools: De-flake and speed up repeater test.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_topic_tools: De-flake and speed up relay test.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_topic_tools: De-flake and speed up filter test.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_topic_tools: De-flake and speed up change_header test.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_cpp_common: Avoid threading errors when stopping nodes created by node_from_nodelet.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_cpp_common: Added build badges in readme.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_cpp_common: time_utils: Fix build on 32bit armhf.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_cpp_common: Be more generous with timeouts in time_utils test, some CI machines are really slow.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: Try to fix github actions cache.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_cpp_common: Improved node_from_nodelet to use node logger instead of nodelet logger.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_cpp_common: Lower performance requirements for thread_utils test.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_cpp_common: Fixed compilation errors on GCC 7 due to the use of designated initializers.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_cpp_common: Fixed parseIntegralNumber() compilation on GCC 7.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_cpp_common: Increased test coverage, fixed bug in filter diagnostics.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_cpp_common: tf2_utils: Added convenience methods getRoll(), getPitch() and getYaw().

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_cpp_common: filter_utils: Adapt to upstream changes adding FilterChain::getFilters() method.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_cpp_common: Make filter_utils compatible with filters 1.8.3 and 1.9.2.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_topic_tools: Improved filter node, added tests for it.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_topic_tools: Added a shortcut in change_header if the header is not changed at all. Deleted hack_frame_id (can be substituted by change_header).

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_topic_tools: Added change_header and relevant support in shape_shifter.h.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_cpp_common: string_utils: Allowed to limit replace() only to the beginning or end of the string.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_topic_tools: Removed no longer needed files.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_topic_tools: Consolidated repeater.cpp and joy_repeater.cpp into repeat.cpp .

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_topic_tools: Added nodelet variant of throttle test.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_cpp_common: string_utils: Added parseDouble() and friends.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_topic_tools: Fixed reading connection header from message events.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_cpp_common: node_from_nodelet.cmake: Made autogenerated target names less prone to naming conflicts.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_topic_tools: Split lazy_subscriber.hpp into header and impl file.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: Added support for std::string format in LogHelper.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: Fix logging macros to log under correct rosconsole logger.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: Added backwards compatibility nodelet definitions for nodelets moved from cras_nodelet_topic_tools.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: Moved hack_frame_id from cras_py_common to cras_topic_tools.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: Better support for custom data types in getParam() functions.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: Rename test targets so that their names do not conflict with other projects.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: Improved CMakeLists.txt and header guard placement.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: Merged cras_nodelet_topic_tools with cras_topic_tools, moved repeated and joy_repeater from cras_cpp_common to cras_topic_tools.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: Refactored nodelet_manager_sharing_tf_buffer and added tests for it.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: Added better shim for std::optional. It now provides all relevant features.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message:
Added more diagnostics to filter_chain_nodelet.hpp.

Added shim for std::bind_front into functional.hpp.
Added running_stats.hpp implementing Welford's running mean and variance computation.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: Added tests for string_utils, little improvements.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: Improved the interface of diag_utils and node_utils, added tests. Added message_utils.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: Improved the interface of nodelet_utils, added tests. Added thread_utils with tests.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: Added test for filter_chain and fixed a few bugs.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: Added test for nodelet_utils getParam() integration.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: Better test coverage of param_utils. Improved Eigen getParam() interface.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: First part of upgrade: log_utils, param_utils, filter_utils, node_utils, xmlrpc, cloud.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: Added XmlRpcValueTraits and issue an error when getParam() finds a parameter value but it has an incompatible type.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message:
Made FilterBase getParam() functions const.

Allowed by https://github.com/ros/filters/pull/35 (released in Melodic filters 1.8.2 (October 2021) and Noetic filters 1.9.1 (September 2021)).

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: Add option to publish only on timer event.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_topic_tools: Added filter node. Added ~reset_timer_on_msg to repeat.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: Quit if bag does not exist.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: Made the relay nodelet real multi-threaded.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: Little fixes, added pool allocator helpers.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_cpp_common: Fix for systems with old versions of diagnostic_updater

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_cpp_common: Compatibility with diagnostic_updater 1.9.6 and newer.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: Added possibility to fix frame IDs.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: camera_throttle: Fix bug in reporting unsynced messages.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: camera_throttle: Support having RGB and depth cameras on different nodehandles.

data.author: Tomas Petricek
data.message: Git-ignoring IDEA project files and build outputs.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_cpp_common: Improve lazy subscription behavior in filter_chain_nodelet.hpp

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_cpp_common: Fixed segfaults when unloading NodeletWithDiagnostics.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_cpp_common: Moved filter_chain_nodelet from nifti_laser_filtering to here.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_cpp_common: Added missing nodelet logging macros.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_cpp_common: Refactored param_utils to be also usable in filters.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_cpp_common: Small refactoring of CMakeLists.txt and related stuff, modernize header guards.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_cpp_common: Fixed reading of hierarchical parameters in diag_utils.hpp.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_cpp_common: Reworked getParam helpers, added some more utility functions.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_cpp_common: Added utilities for working with pointclouds - generic iterator, transformOnlyChannels() and more utility functions.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: Little fixes, verified that Eigen compiles using AVX instructions.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_cpp_common: Added a mixin for nodelets which share a tf buffer with their nodelet manager (and added that custom manager, too).

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_cpp_common: Forced tf2_sensor_msgs cloud transform tools to utilize SIMD instructions.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_cpp_common: Improved nodelet_utils, converted all convenience functions into mixins that can be side-loaded to any class.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_cpp_common: Separated nodelet param loading to a separate class so that it can be utilized even in nodelets that are not descendants of cras::Nodelet().

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_cpp_common: Added tf2_sensor_msgs with transformWithChannels() function to help correctly transforming pointclouds.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: cras_cpp_common: Fixed to_string() for collections so that it doesn't include the separator after the last item.

data.author: Tomas Petricek
data.message: Topic repeater node (every period, instant republish option).

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: tf_static_publisher: TF static publisher now doesn't spam if there are no transforms to publish. It also publishes only when the transforms really change.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: tf_static_publisher: Fixed a bug with array parameters.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: tf_static_publisher can now reload the params either periodically or on a trigger

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message:
cras_cpp_common: Added CMake module for using the most modern
C++ filesystem API available.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: filter_utils: Added support for disabling filters during runtime.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: filter_utils: Added a possibility to specify a callback in FilterChain that is called after application of each filter.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: nodelet_utils: Added shutdown() method meant to be called from destructors.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: nodelet_utils: Added option to use nodelet-aware canTransform

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: Added inline modifiers to avoid multiple definitions issues.

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message: Added std::string - const char* interop overload to getParam.

data.author: jane-mobile
data.message: ROS mapping and exploration node has been initialized.
